title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch

title: Magic: The Gathering Live-Action TV and Movie Universe in the Works From Legendary, Hasbro
description: Magic, gather! A live-action TV and movie universe based on the 32-year old, wildly popular Magic: The Gathering trading card game is being built by Legendary Entertainment and Hasbro Entertainment, it was announced on Thursday. Initial plans call for a feature film to be dealt out first, with television series and other content to be […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Holland Taylor to Play Matthew McConaughey’s Mom in Apple TV+ Comedy With Woody Harrelson
description: Emmy winner Holland Taylor has boarded the cast of the Apple TV+ comedy that was announced nearly two years ago and will reunite True Detective Season 1 stars Matthew McConaughey and Woody Harrelson. The as-yet-untitled, 10-episode, half-hour comedy series stars Harrelson and McConaughey in a “heartfelt odd couple love story” revolving around the actors’ strange […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: The Hunting Party Season 1 Episode 2 Spoilers: Bex’s Alliances are Tested
description: Bex's alliances are tested on The Hunting Party Season 1 Episode 2 during an intense manhunt for the next deranged killer. Check out the details. The post The Hunting Party Season 1 Episode 2 Spoilers: Bex’s Alliances are Tested appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Laura Nowak

title: Sarah Michelle Gellar Confirms Involvement With Buffy the Vampire Slayer Reboot, Tells Fans “This Will Be For You”
description: Sarah Michelle Gellar is speaking out about the return of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, and reveals why it's time. The post Sarah Michelle Gellar Confirms Involvement With Buffy the Vampire Slayer Reboot, Tells Fans “This Will Be For You” appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Paul Dailly
